create hive table with an int partition column

CREATE TABLE CDRDWH.CDR_FACT (

connect boolean,
earlyEvent boolean,

term_number string

partitioned by (date_id int)
clustered by (geo_id, time_id) into 16 buckets
stored as ORC
tblproperties ("orc.compress"="SNAPPY‚Äù);
